title: Details of Forest Products Exported from the Municipality
content1: Generally, the items used as forest products are wood, firewood, medicinal plants etc. Economic gains can be made by commercial production and export of such forest products by scientific management of forests or development of green areas. Especially in areas with large forest coverage, forests can be taken as the backbone of local development.
content2: Looking at the situation of sales, distribution and consumption of forest products produced from Chaudandigadhi Municipality, the production here has been going to other areas within the district as well as other districts after meeting the supply of this municipality. In this municipality, wood/firewood consumption mainly occurs in industries based on forest products. Apart from this, the demand for wood/firewood required by the growing population and migration and urbanization and wood for development construction has been increasing. Households living close to forests consume more wood/firewood while households living far from forests consume very little wood/firewood.
